meanings.sent1: I drew colorful enneagons in my math class.
meanings.sent2: The playground had enneagons painted on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a masterpiece using only enneagons.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a puzzle of interconnected enneagons.
meanings.sent5: The enneagons in the pattern stood out boldly.

meanings.sent1: The stained glass window featured intricate enneagons.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with enneagons of various sizes.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with sugary enneagons.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts formed a web of interconnected enneagons.
meanings.sent5: The enneagons on the kite danced in the wind.
